topics.body:
Alright! Time to recap!

One Piece: We're nearing the end of this arc. We still need to see Luffy's fight with Mingo though. I feel like the arc has stretched a bit too long though.

Bleach: Shit's poppin' off in Soul Society and it's all falling apart. LITERALLY.

Hero Academia: TOURNAMENT ARC BITCHES!

Torkio: Toriko and the gang trained in an ancient simian martial art so they can fight the monkey king, tear off his balls, and eat them.
topics.author: 4fde4618945b700aa0002fff
